openingHymn.title: We Thank Thee, O God, for a Prophet

sacramentHymn.title: Father in Heaven, We Do Believe

announcements: We would like to remind everyone that General Conference is next week. The schedule is posted online and can be found using the link below:

Our ward Easter Activity will be on April 8th at 8:00am. We will meet on the southwest field at Countryside Park. There will be an easter egg hunt, games, and refreshments. We ask that youth please arrive at 7:30am to help prepare the easter egg hunt.
As a reminder, on Easter Sunday we will meet for Sacrament meeting only without any meetings taking place during the 2nd hour.
We invite all ward members to prayerfully consider participating in the employment questionnairre. The link for the questionnaire can be found below:
